DOC.brief_summary: This study aim assess effectiveness two Physiotherapy treatment : one manual therapy use joint traction , passive muscle stretching , isometric exercise , active resist proprioception exercise ; treatment educational session home exercise improve ROM , muscle strength proprioception patient haemophilia arthropathy knee .
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized trial two treatment group : one use joint traction , passive muscle stretch isometric exercise , active resist proprioception exercise ( group MT ) ; another educational session home exercise ( group E ) ; control group ( group C ) . The intervention carry twelve week , perform evaluation treatment , six month finalize . The treatment MT group consist two session per week one hour , treatment group E consist session 90 minute every two week , exercise daily home . The control group ( group C ) receive treatment . After allocation group , composition follow : MT group = 7 ; E group = 7 ; control group = 7 .
